description.en:
This plugin provides a comprehensive overview of your Farming Simulator 25 server directly from your web browser. It consists of two main components: a LUA plugin and a Python script. The LUA plugin collects data regularly and writes it to an XML file. The Python script reads this file and generates a regularly updated website.
Features: - Retrieve mission information - Retrieve player information - Retrieve farm information - Retrieve farmland details - (Upcoming) Retrieve player positions - (Upcoming) Retrieve vehicle positions - (Upcoming) Retrieve stationary building positions
This plugin ensures you have all the essential information about your server at your fingertips, enhancing your Farming Simulator 25 experience.
Check our GitHub projects for a complete change log and version history: - Gameserver Plugin: https://github.com/kandru/farmsim-status-plugin - GUI: https://github.com/kandru/farmsim-status-gui
